name: Reload the Dice
description:
Narrative: You stayed up late at the casino. Roulette has already stopped earning, and the waitress is tired of bringing free drinks. And now you just closed your eyes, as if falling asleep ...

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The main task of the game is to score as many points as possible.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Elevator: The game is an FPS, with an innovative reloading mechanics based on randomization of some ocharacteristics of the weapon and its interaction with the opponents.

The player earns points for destroying evil pool balls. This gives a certain number of points (depending on the level of the opponent)

Each weapon's reload gives you a somewhat unique result. There are also some negative caveats....

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Jam idea: The main idea behind this Game Jam was to make a weapon that would randomly change stats on each reload, including the negative ones.

Right now there are 4 different stats, three of which are positive, bullet speed, bullet size, bullet damage, bonus elemental damage, and one negative stat. Each time, when reloading, each of the characteristics changes randomly to one of the available options.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

W,A,S,D- movement.

Lmouse - fire shot.

Space - jump.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The game is made using Unreal Engine and the Apparatus ECS framework.
